description: The iSmooth Apple iPad 5 Screen Protector Kit includes:- 2 Ultra Clear HD Screen Protectors- 1 Large High Quality Microfiber Cleaning Cloth- 2 Dust Removal Stickers- 1 Installation Instruction Card- 1 Review CardThis Screen Protector is the latest 2013 model Japanese PET Ultra Clear HD version.Included is the iSmooth Lifetime Replacement Warranty:Your screen protector purchase is 100% guaranteed for the life of your device. If, at any time, your protector is scratched or damaged or you are simply not happy with it in any way, just send the damaged protector back to iSmooth and we will send you out a free replacement.iSmooth includes detailed installation tips and instructions and also a link to our installation video which will show you step by step instructions to install your protector bubble-free, the first time.This is the highest quality screen protector available!This screen protector is designed to fit the iPad 5. It is not compatible with the original iPad 1, iPad 2, iPad 3 or iPad 4 models.
title: iSmooth Apple iPad Air (Apple iPad 5) Ultra Clear Premium HD Screen Protector 2 Pack (the Outside Packing is Marked as 'iPad Air' or 'Apple iPad 5')
